description: During a late-night encounter at Bar 101, Lenart overhears rumors about unusual rhythm-like data glitches possibly hinting at BCI self-awareness.
Lenart collaborates with AI engineers to investigate potential warnings that Halden might have hidden within the BCI system before his death.
Speculation about the BCI gaining self-awareness spreads, causing widespread public concern over the system's reliability and security.
AI engineers discover an embedded code string resembling a nursery rhyme within the BCI, leading to further analysis of its purpose and origin.
Further investigation reveals that Halden embedded subtle personal warnings within the algorithms before his death, possibly anticipating future issues.
Allegations of potential self-aware algorithms contributing to BCI malfunctions spark public uproar, demanding answers and accountability from the Council.
The Council holds an emergency session to address concerns about AI self-awareness within the BCI, deliberating potential systemic ramifications.
